comment: The President of the Student Union at Southampton University wants to tear down a mural dedicated to World War I veterans simply because the men depicted are White. This is the kind of brainwashing that happens in higher education.
amr:
# ::snt The President of the Student Union at Southampton University wants to tear down a mural dedicated to World War I veterans simply because the men depicted are White. This is the kind of brainwashing that happens in higher education.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / want-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (o / organization
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Student"
                                    :op2 "Union")
                              :location (u / university
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Southampton")))
                        :ARG2 (p2 / president)))
            :ARG1 (t / tear-down-05
                  :ARG0 p
                  :ARG1 (m2 / mural
                        :ARG1-of (d / dedicate-01
                              :ARG2 (v / veteran
                                    :mod (w2 / war
                                          :name (n3 / name
                                                :op1 "World"
                                                :op2 "War"
                                                :op3 "I"))))))
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (w3 / white-02
                        :ARG1 (m3 / man
                              :ARG1-of (d2 / depict-01)))
                  :ARG1-of (s / simple-02)))
      :snt2 (b / brainwash-01
            :mod (k / kind
                  :mod (t2 / this))
            :location (e / educate-01
                  :ARG1-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                        :ARG2 (h3 / high-02
                              :ARG1 e)
                        :ARG3 (m4 / more)))))

comment: Please refrain from using 'cunt' as an insult. It's slander against women, believe it or not, and is ignorant and childish.

      :snt1 (r / refrain-01

            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)

                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (c / cunt)

                  :op2 (c2 / childish
                        :domain s))))
